titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers the targeted jobs credit for hiring individuals who have received, or were eligible to receive, unemployment compensation covering at least 90 days.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/9/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers the targeted jobs credit for hiring unemployment compensation recipients if such recipients work for at least six months.
